hero.title: XI EAFO Basic Medical Courses

about_course.highlight_1: 100+ hours of lectures and practical training

course_content.clinicalOncologyDesc: Advanced diagnostic techniques and treatment protocols.
course_content.molecularDiagnosisDesc: Latest advances in genetic testing and molecular diagnostics.
course_content.oncohematologyDesc: Comprehensive study of blood cancers and treatments.
course_content.cancerBiologyDesc: Advanced understanding of cancer development and progression.
course_content.careerDevelopmentDesc: Biostatistics, grant writing, and networking skills.

drPetrov.name: Dr. Alexander Petrov
drPetrov.title: Oncologist, Moscow Clinical Hospital
drPetrov.quote: The course provided invaluable hands-on experience and networking opportunities. It was a turning point in my career.
